info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 24 at 3:31PM PDT until August 24 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM PDT FOR WESTERN CLARK AND SOUTHERN NYE COUNTIES... At 330 PM PDT, an area of dust was located 10 miles west of Mountain Springs, or 14 miles southwest of Red Rock Canyon, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include Pahrump, NV 160 and NV 372 PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
